original: Ihre, Jacob Henrik Olaus, vicekon-sul, Visby, f. 1/1/78 i Visby av bank-kamr. Jacques L o. Maria Svebilius. G. 05 m. Elisabeth Rydbeck. Barn: Ingemar f. 07, Halvar 09, Gösta 11, d. 44, Gunilla 17. — Anst. å hand:kont. i Visby 95-98, e. o. tj :man v. Gotl. hypoteksfören. 96-00, i riksb. 96, re-gistr. v. dess kont. i Linköp. 01, kassör i Sundsvall 05, kamr. i Visby 11, verkst. dir. i Bank A-B Södra Sv:e i Visby 15-19, dir. f. Sv. Hand:bankens avd:centr. där 19-38. Finsk v. konsul sed. 21. Led. av drätselkamm. 15-28, stadsfullm. rådm. 38-44, v. ordf. i Gotl. hand :kamm., ordf. i kristidsndn, ordf. i ’Styr. f. Gotl. 1. epid:sjukh. o. hem f. kron. sjuka samt i direkt, f. tub:sjukstugan 32-41, led. av direkt, f. länslas. sed. 42, huv :man i DBV Sparbank, ordf. i styr. f. Visby Spannm:- & Gödn:ämnes A-B 37-43, led. av styr. f. Sv. Hand :bankens avd :kont. o. Gotl. fornvänner m. m. GV:sJmt, RVO, RFinliVR01’M, FFrK-4kl.
translated: Ihre, Jacob Henrik Olaus, Vice Consul, Visby, born on January 1st, 1878 in Visby to bank officer Jacques L and Maria Svebilius. Married in 1905 to Elisabeth Rydbeck. Children: Ingemar, born in 1907, Halvar, born in 1909, Gösta, born in 1911 (passed away in 1944), Gunilla, born in 1917. Worked at a commercial bank in Visby from 1895-1898, assistant clerk at Gotland Mortgage Company from 1896-1900, at the National Bank in 1896, registered with its branch in Linköping in 1901, cashier in Sundsvall in 1905, clerk in Visby in 1911, executive director of Bank AB Södra Sve in Visby from 1915-1919, director of the Swedish Handelsbanken's branch office from 1919-1938. Finnish Vice Consul since 1921. Member of the City Council from 1915-1928, city councilman from 1938-1944, vice chairman of the Gotland Chamber of Commerce, Chairman of the War Emergency Committee, Chairman of the Board of Directors of the Gotland Epidemic Hospital and Home for the Chronically ill, as well as director of the Tuberculosis Home from 1932-1941, member of the Board of Directors of the County Savings Bank since 1942, chairman of DBV Savings Bank, chairman of the Board of Directors of Visby Grain and Fertilizer Corporation from 1937-1943, member of the Board of Directors of the Swedish Handelsbanken's branch offices and of the Gotland Antiquarians among others. Awarded with GV:sJmt, RVO, RFinliVR01'M, and FFrK-4kl. Note that the format '\d\d m. partner's name' means that the person married in the year 19xx.

hasOccupation.name: Registered with National Bank's Branch in Linköping
